events.message: I received my new headphones yesterday, but one of the ear cups is damaged and won’t stay in place properly.
The system has categorized this case under Product Defect due to the reported damage and faulty component.
Your case has been assigned to an agent specialized in product defects. They will assist you shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones, and I’m here to help.
Could you please provide a photo of the damaged ear cup and confirm if the packaging was also damaged upon delivery?
I have attached photos showing the damage to the ear cup. The packaging was intact, so I’m not sure how this happened.
Thank you for the information. We can either send a replacement unit or offer a full refund for the product. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement unit, as I really like this model and want to continue using it once fixed.
We have processed your replacement request and you will receive the new headphones within 5 business days. A return label for the damaged unit will be sent shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement headphones and that everything is working as expected.
Yes, I received the replacement today and it’s perfect. Thank you for your prompt and helpful support!
We are glad your issue was resolved satisfactorily. We are closing this case now. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
